title: Arrangement statement
description: A statement identifying and describing the arrangement that is the subject of the ownership or control described in a beneficial ownership statement.

statementType.title: The type of statement. This should always be 'arrangementStatement'
statementType.description: What is being described by this statement?

arrangementType.title: Type
arrangementType.description: Arrangements are artificial entities that associate one or more natural or legal persons together in an ownership or control relationship, without implying that the parties to this arrangement have any other form of collective legal identity. The 'trust' code covers trusts. The 'jointShareholding' code covers joint shareholdings, where two or more natural persons share beneficial ownership rights to the same entity. The 'unincorporatedJointVenture' code covers a business arrangement between two or more entities where beneficial ownership rights are defined in advance but where the joint venture has no legal personality of its own. The 'contract' code covers any legal agreement able to confer beneficial ownership rights on another party.

missingInfoReason.title: Missing information reason(s)
missingInfoReason.description: For arrangements with `arrangementType` of 'unknownArrangement' this field should contain an explanation of the reason that detailed information on the arrangement is not provided. This may be a standard descriptive phrase from the source system, or a free-text justification.

name.title: Name
name.description: The declared name of this arrangement.

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.description: One or more official identifiers for this entity. Where available, official registration numbers should be provided.

startDate.title: Start date
startDate.description: When was this arrangement formed, begun, entered into or signed. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.

endDate.title: End date
endDate.description: If this arrangement is no longer active, or is due to end on a date, provide the date on which it ends or is due to end. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: One or more addresses for this arrangement.

uri.title: URI
uri.description: Where a [persistent URI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Identifier) is available for this entity this should be included.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source of information about this entity.
